author: thomreis
body:
Remove the check if the two etsums are empty from the calo L2 to uGT comparison. This leads to mismatches otherwise when the calo L2 is not in the run.

This reintroduces the changes done in #22878 that were removed with #22961 and in addition protects against the iterator trying to read from the end of the collection.
title: L1T DQM Remove etsum collection empty check.
